subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] This is maybe the best image.
author: Tracy
full_text:
--0-499307096-1190402827=:52261
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hey Frank,
  I told my deceased brother  "Go see Frank and get your portrait taken"  , lol.. :)
   
  I don't think you'd even need to go to the cemetary, 'they' pretty much want to communicate with us as bad as we do with them and I would  bet they are just crowding around you...

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          I haven't been to cemetary yet, to record anything. I do all my work in my basement. 
 
 Frank-S


    
---------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: hkaczmarek@...
Date: Fri, 21 Sep 2007 10:50:24 -0500
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] This is maybe the best image.

        Thanks! I know I have been pretty independent with it. I tried to form a group in my area, but the interest wasn't too high. People didn't want to do this, they wanted to go ghost hunting into cemeteries. Fine for some, but I am much more into ITC.
   
  Heather
    .
  

    Oh yeah, Welcome to the group! I think mostly we're independents, and wildcatters of the paranormal world. 
 
 Frank-S


    
---------------------------------
  
      



  .
 
  





  
---------------------------------
  Make your little one a shining star! Shine on!
